column2: ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. THERE ARE SEVERAL CIVILIANS APPROACHING THE VERNON. WHAT SHOULD WE DO. OVER.
COPY THAT PAPA BEAR. NO WEAPONS. NO RUSSIANS. THEY ARE CIVILIANS. OVER.
ALPA TO PAPA BEAR. SMALL RUSSIAN SQUAD TRIED TO CHASE DOWN THE CIVIS. THEY ARE ELIMINATED. OVER.
HEY ALPHA LEADER. CHECK OUT SOUTH, WE HAVE CIVILIANS INCOMING.
OKAY WE ARE PICKING UP THE CIVILIANS NOW.
CIVILIANS ARE ON SAFE GROUND. TRANSPORTING THEM DEEPER INTO FRIENDLY TERRITORY. OVER.
YOU SAID THEY ARE CIVILIANS. NO WEAPONS IN SIGHT. NO RUSSIANS. CONFIRM ALPHA. OVER.
ROGER. USE CAUTION AND RECEIVE THEM. OVER.
COPY ALPHA. WE ARE SENDING TRUCK TO PICK UP THE CIVILIANS. STAY SHARP UNTIL IT ARRIVES. OVER.
